name: Super Ice-Cream Roller Ultra [LD41]
description:
LUDUMDARE 41 SUBMISSION

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/super-ice-cream-roller-ultra

[rolling ball + time management aspects]

It is a rolling ball game with tme management aspects. Serve as much icecream as you can before the time runs out!

Controls

Keyboard: WASD/ARROWS and X

XboxController: Left analog stick and A button

How to play

Serve as much icecream as you can before the time runs out!

Credits

a game by Bhérring Paucar Bonifacio (@probe_31)

music download from: https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
